EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners Inquiry (1320681390.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Inquiry (1320681390.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Claude,
I emailed Brittney and she informed me that they are not moving forward with you and to disregard the referral. What MBO provides is an alternative for 1099 contractors to self incorporation. I have included some information below in case you are interested in speaking with me still as you can choose to use our services if you find consulting projects on your own.
Link to a summary of the value of using MBO Partners: http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Introduction.pdf Link to a video about How We Help Independent Consultants:http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zKDzwSTmGv4&hd=1
Using MBO Partners versus working on a 1099 basis:http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_vs_1099_Comparison.pdf
If you have any additional questions for me feel free to schedule a convenient time using my online schedule: https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK
Thank you, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: Claude Wright [mailto:buddy8304@cablespeed.com] Sent: Friday, November 04, 2011 1:09 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: RE: MBO Partners Inquiry
I was referred to your company by: brittneyclemens@eleventwenty.com. Can you touch base with her to see why she referred me to you.
From: Nicolette Taylor [mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com] Sent: Friday, November 04, 2011 9:58 AM To: buddy8304@cablespeed.com Subject: MBO Partners Inquiry
Dear, Thank you for the inquiry you submitted at the MBO Partners website. I wanted to introduce myself as the person at MBO Partners responsible for all new associate and partnership requests. I’ll be your main point of contact to provide you an overview of our services or answer any specific questions you may have.
You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here: https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK
You can also watch a short video about who we are on You Tube: http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4.
I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners!
Have a great weekend, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
